sense.gloss: being in charge (of an area of responsibility), being responsible (for a work role, etc.)
taking on one's share (e.g. of work), dividing (work, expenses, etc.) between, apportionment, allotment, allocation, assignment
to carry on one's shoulder, to shoulder, to bear
to bear (burden, responsibility, etc.), to take upon oneself
being in charge of (esp. a class or subject), taking charge of
class teacher, homeroom teacher, form teacher
person bearing responsibility, person in charge, supporter
carrying (on one's shoulder), bearing, shouldering, taking responsibility for
bucket carried on either end of a pole

sdata.j: ↑協力↑↓きょうりょく↓を↑望↑↓のぞ↓むなら↑責任↑↓せきにん↓を↑分担↑↓ぶんたん↓しなさい。
sdata.e: When you want cooperation, share the work among many hands.

sdata.j: ↑外国↑↓がいこく↓↑勢力↑↓せいりょく↓に↑加担↑↓かたん↓するスパイ↑活動↑↓かつどう↓にたずさわるならば、あなたは↑祖国↑↓そこく↓を↑裏切↑↓うらぎ↓ることになる。
sdata.e: If you engage in espionage for a foreign power, you are selling your country down the river.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は、↑日常↑↓にちじょう↓↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑義務↑↓ぎむ↓や↑責任↑↓せきにん↓を↑担↑↓にな↓っている。
sdata.e: In everyday life we have many obligations and responsibilities.

sdata.j: ↑家事↑↓かじ↓を↑分担↑↓ぶんたん↓する↑夫婦↑↓ふうふ↓がますますふえています。
sdata.e: More and more married couples share household chores.

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓を↑担保↑↓たんぽ↓にお↑金↑↓かね↓を↑借↑↓か↓りよう。
sdata.e: We'll borrow some money on the house.

sdata.j: ボーイング↑社↑↓しゃ↓の↑安全↑↓あんぜん↓↑担当↑↓たんとう↓の↑専門↑↓せんもん↓↑家↑↓か↓は↑航空↑↓こうくう↓↑産業↑↓さんぎょう↓の↑他↑↓ほか↓の↑専門↑↓せんもん↓↑家↑↓か↓と↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓になって↑制御↑↓せいぎょ↓↑飛行↑↓ひこう↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓の↑墜落↑↓ついらく↓（ＣＦＩＴ）として↑知↑↓し↓られている↑墜落↑↓ついらく↓↑事故↑↓じこ↓をなくそうと↑国際↑↓こくさい↓↑的↑↓てき↓な↑対策↑↓たいさく↓↑委員↑↓いいん↓↑会↑↓かい↓を↑組織↑↓そしき↓している。
sdata.e: Boeing's safety experts have joined others in the industry to form an international task force to try to eliminate one particular kind of air crash known as controlled flight into terrain, CFIT.

sdata.j: ブラウン↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓たちのクラスの↑担任↑↓たんにん↓である。
sdata.e: Mr Brown is in charge of our class.

sdata.j: タクシー↑代↑↓だい↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓と↑分担↑↓ぶんたん↓しよう。
sdata.e: I will share the cost of the taxi with you.

sdata.j: その↑老人↑↓ろうじん↓は↑車↑↓くるま↓にひかれて↑直↑↓ただ↓ちに↑病院↑↓びょういん↓に↑担↑↓かつ↓ぎ↑込↑↓こ↓まれた。
sdata.e: The old man was run over and immediately taken to hospital.

sdata.j: その↑費用↑↓ひよう↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑負担↑↓ふたん↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: The expense is chargeable on him.

words.gloss: being in charge (of an area of responsibility), being responsible (for a work role, etc.)
